page.title: Advanced Tutorial
page.p:
This tutorial contains the following:
UNIX Philosophy: Now that you know the basics, we'll examine somewhat more closely the principles that underlie certain otherwise confusing features in what follows
Guided tasks: We'll continue in the vein of the basic guided tasks, but now with tasks that illustrate some more advanced bash concepts such as output redirection and more complicated control flow.
Exercises: As before, some further tasks, except now with only a few possible answers and minimal commentary provided.
